Title: ERRATUM: Factors related to sense of competence in family caregivers of people living with dementia in the community: A narrative synthesis (International Psychogeriatrics (2018) DOI: 10.1017/S1041610218001394)
Abstract: © International Psychogeriatric Association 2019 .DOI: https://doi.org/10.1017/S1041610218001394, Published by Cambridge University Press, 23 November 2018 The above article (Stansfeld et al., 2018) published with an incorrect affiliation for Georgina Charlesworth. Georgina Charlesworth's affiliations are as follows: 2Research and Development, North East London NHS Foundation Trust, Goodmayes Hospital, UK and 4Department of Clinical, Educational and Health Psychology, University College London, London, UK The original article has been corrected online to rectify this error.
